ALLCAPS

Class PlayerStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • ALLCAPS.Player
      • ALLCAPS.PlayerStats

  • public class PlayerStats
extends ALLCAPS.Player
    The PlayerStats class organizes the statistics that we will track for each team member during a given season. Variables that change during the season (games played, goals, assists, points) have associated mutator methods described below
    Since:
    June 2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerStats(ALLCAPS.Player player, int gp, int g, int a, int pt, int ssy)
      Comprehensive constructor -- initializes all player variables.

      formats all available variables for display

      formats variables for display
      int getAssists()
      returns the current number of assists by the player this season
      int getGamesPlayed()
      returns the current number of games played by the player this season

      returns the current number of goals scored by the player this season

      returns the current number of points earned by the player this season

      returns the season start year that corresponds to this instance's data

      sets the number of assists by the player this season

      sets how many games played by the player this season
      void setGoals(int goals)

      void setPoints(int points)
      sets the points earned by the player this season

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerStats

        public PlayerStats(ALLCAPS.Player player,
                   int gp,
                   int g,
                   int a,
                   int pt,
                   int ssy)
        Comprehensive constructor -- initializes all player variables. Once these variables have been initialized, only the games played, goals, assists, and points variables may be subsequently changed
        Parameters:
        player - single variable that stores player's first and last name, jersey number, and position
        gp - games played by player
        g - goals by player
        a - assists by player
        pt - player's points
        ssy - season start year

      • formatInfo

        public java.lang.String formatInfo()
        formats all available variables for display
        Returns:

      • formatInfoRegSeason

        public java.lang.String formatInfoRegSeason()
        formats variables for display
        Returns:
        String of player's stats (season start and end year NOT included in output)
